Name: Courtyard Spawn
Description: South spawn plaza; open courtyard with planters/crates.

Name: Mid Cut West
Description: Rotation cut from west hall to bazaar M1/M2 boundary.

Name: Mid Cut East
Description: Rotation cut from east hall to bazaar M1/M2 boundary.

Name: Jog
Description: Center segment offset; primary LoS break.

Name: West Hall South
Description: West service alley near Courtyard connector.

Name: West Hall Mid
Description: West alley mid beat near Mid Cut.

Name: West Hall North
Description: West alley near Gate connector / North Cut.

Name: East Hall South
Description: East service alley near Courtyard connector.

Name: East Hall Mid
Description: East alley mid beat near Mid Cut.

Name: East Hall North
Description: East alley near Gate connector / North Cut.

Name: North Cut West
Description: Rotation cut into bazaar near M3.

Name: North Cut East
Description: Rotation cut into bazaar near M3.
